---
title: "protocol_19"
---

Protocol_19.m  - based on protocol 10 - but includes the 'curtain' ON /
OFF stimuli and the 2ON 14OFF stimuli.

## Protocol Parameters

| Parameter | Value |
|:----------|:------|
| Conditions | 12 |
| Patterns Used | 6 |
| t_acclim | 20s |
| t_pause | 0.015 |


## Conditions

| # | Pattern | Speed | Duration | Description |
|--:|:--------|------:|---------:|:------------|
| 1 | [Pattern 9](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_09.qmd) | 10 | -s | grating - 60 deg |
| 2 | [Pattern 9](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_09.qmd) | 10 | -s |  |
| 3 | [Pattern 4](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_04.qmd) | 10 | -s | grating - 15 deg - - 3 |
| 4 | [Pattern 4](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_04.qmd) | 10 | -s | - - 4 |
| 5 | [Pattern 19](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_19.qmd) | 10 | -s | ON curtain - - 5 |
| 6 | [Pattern 19](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_19.qmd) | 10 | -s | - - 6 |
| 7 | [Pattern 20](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_20.qmd) | 10 | -s | OFF curtain - - 7 |
| 8 | [Pattern 20](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_20.qmd) | 10 | -s | - - 8 |
| 9 | [Pattern 17](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_17.qmd) | 10 | -s | 2ON 14OFF grating - - 9 |
| 10 | [Pattern 17](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_17.qmd) | 10 | -s | - - 10 |
| 11 | [Pattern 24](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_24.qmd) | 10 | -s | 2OFF 14ON grating - - 11 |
| 12 | [Pattern 24](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_24.qmd) | 10 | -s | - - 12 |
